subject: Your approval is waiting!  Sun, 15 Apr 2007 21:02:13 -0800
body:
Dear Home 0wner 

Are you fed up with paying too much mortgage interest?. Your loan has been approved.

You can receive $270,000 for 
$595 per month.

Please respond Right Away.
http://ilook.tw/nsg8






Stuart Johnson
Academy Finance


Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did. So throw off the bowlines, Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream.	Mark Twain [Samuel Langhornne Clemens] (1835-1910)
